alert.note: Alert for Benewah; Kootenai (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 5:51PM MDT until June 09 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Benewah County in the Panhandle of Idaho... Southeastern Kootenai County in the Panhandle of Idaho... * Until 530 PM PDT. * At 451 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of St. Maries, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Maries, Harrison, Parkline, Emida, St. Joe, and Chatcolet. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
